General.Name: Shenzhen Mingdiao Decoration Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Mingdiao Decoration Co.,Ltd. provides home decoration services in China. Its services include design, engineering construction, wood product customization, and decorative material purchase. The company also engages in the management; marketing planning; and property leasing activities. Shenzhen Mingdiao Decoration Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

1.Name: Mr. Jin Cheng  Lin
1.Title: Vice Chairman of Directors & Deputy GM
